title: The Draymond Green Show - A Holiday Mailbag
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - A Holiday Mailbag
description:
For a holiday episode of his show, Draymond answers his fans most pressing questions from what’s it like playing an NBA game on Christmas to what song would you sing to save the universe, and much more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
